name: Pong Revenge
description:
In this take on Pong, work together to overcome the game as it throws obstacles at you!  Shortly after starting the game will turn on you, throwing obstacles your way.  Last as long as you can, while scoring additional points for hitting those obstacles!

Controls:
The paddles can move up and down, as well as tilting left and right.
Left Player: WASD
Right Player: Arrow Keys 

Enemies:
Green: Speeds up the ball
Red: Slows down the ball
Paddle: It's a paddle . . . that spins!
Pink: Sends out concussive explosions
Yellow: Teleports the ball from any "in" portal to a random "out" portal
Blue: Sucks your ball in and spits it right back out!

Music by Eric Skiff: http://ericskiff.com/music/
